ingredients.ingredient: 5 pounds chicken wings, cut into thirds and tips discarded

cookingTips: Mix glaze ingredients thoroughly to dissolve brown sugar completely
Toss wings with glaze and spread in single layer on lined baking sheet
Bake at 350°F for 45-50 minutes, stirring halfway through for even caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should I bake the wings first and then add glaze, or combine them from the start? What temperature ensures they're crispy?
